FuncDef: This command configures RFC 2684,Multiprotocol Encapsulation over ATM AAL5,encapsulation for an ATM PVCC delimited SAP. This command specifies the data encapsulation for an ATM PVCC delimited SAP. The definition also references the ATM Forum LAN Emulation specification. The encapsulation is driven by the services for which the SAP is configured.

ParaDef.Info: specifies the encapsulation type. Values-aal5snap-routed - Routed encapsulation for LLC encapsulated circuit (LLC/SNAP precedes protocol datagram) as defined in RFC 2684..

ExtraInfo: Default: encapsulation aal5snap-routed (for VPRN service SAPs)
